00049 void Vec2Zero(Vec2* Result)
00050 {
00051         Result->x = 0;
00052         Result->y = 0;
00053 }

00069 /*************************************************************************/
00070 void Vec2Set(Vec2* Result, float x, float y)
00071 {
00072         Result->x = x;
00073         Result->y = y;
00074 }

00087 /*************************************************************************/
00088 void Vec2Negate(Vec2* Result, Vec2* Operand)
00089 {
00090         Result->x = -(Operand->x);
00091         Result->y = -(Operand->y);
00092 }

00108 /*************************************************************************/
00109 void Vec2Add(Vec2* Result, Vec2* Operand1, Vec2* Operand2)
00110 {
00111         Result->x = Operand1->x + Operand2->x;
00112         Result->y = Operand1->y + Operand2->y;
00113 }
00114 
00115 /*************************************************************************/
00129 /*************************************************************************/
00130 void Vec2Subtract(Vec2* Result, Vec2* Operand1, Vec2* Operand2)
00131 {
00132         Result->x = Operand1->x - Operand2->x;
00133         Result->y = Operand1->x - Operand2->y;
00134 }
00135 
00136 /*************************************************************************/
00147 /*************************************************************************/
00148 void Vec2Normalize(Vec2* Result, Vec2* Operand)
00149 {
00150         float length = Vec2Length(Operand);
00151 
00152         Result->x = Operand->x / length;
00153         Result->y = Operand->y / length;
00154 }
00155

00157 /*************************************************************************/
00171 /*************************************************************************/
00172 void Vec2Scale(Vec2* Result, Vec2* Operand, float Scalar)
00173 {
00174         Result->x = Scalar * Operand->x;
00175         Result->y = Scalar * Operand->y;
00176 }

00178 /*************************************************************************/
00192 /*************************************************************************/
00193 void Vec2Project(Vec2* Result, Vec2* Operand1, Vec2* Operand2)
00194 {
00195         //Vector b onto a
00196         // b = Op1, a = Op2
00197 
00198         float scalar; // (a . b) / (a . a)
00199 
00200         scalar = Vec2DotProduct(Operand2, Operand1) / Vec2DotProduct(Operand2, Operand2);
00201 
00202         Vec2Scale(Result, Operand2, scalar);
00203 }
00204 
00205 /*************************************************************************/
00216 /*************************************************************************/
00217 float Vec2Length(Vec2* Operand)
00218 {
00219         return (sqrt(Vec2SquareLength(Operand)));
00220 }
00221 
00222 /*************************************************************************/
00233 /*************************************************************************/
00234 float Vec2SquareLength(Vec2* Operand)
00235 {
00236         return (Operand->x * Operand->x + Operand->y * Operand->y);
00237 }
00238 
00239 /*************************************************************************/
00253 /*************************************************************************/
00254 float Vec2Distance(Vec2* Operand1, Vec2* Operand2)
00255 {       
00256         return (sqrt(Vec2SquareDistance(Operand1, Operand2)));
00257 }
00258 
00259 /*************************************************************************/
00273 /*************************************************************************/
00274 float Vec2SquareDistance(Vec2* Operand1, Vec2* Operand2)
00275 {
00276         float x_square;
00277         float y_square;
00278 
00279         x_square = (Operand1->x - Operand2->x) * (Operand1->x - Operand2->x);
00280         y_square = (Operand1->y - Operand2->y) * (Operand1->y - Operand2->y);
00281 
00282         return (x_square + y_square);
00283 }
00284 
00285 /*************************************************************************/
00299 /*************************************************************************/
00300 float Vec2DotProduct(Vec2* Operand1, Vec2* Operand2)
00301 {
00302         return (Operand1->x * Operand2->x + Operand1->y * Operand2->y);
00303 }
00304 
00305 /*************************************************************************/
00316 /*************************************************************************/
00317 float Vec2CrossProductMag(Vec2* Operand1, Vec2* Operand2)
00318 {
00319         return (Operand1->x * Operand2->y - Operand1->y * Operand2->x);
00320 }
00321 
00322 /*************************************************************************/
00333 /*************************************************************************/
00334 void Vec2RotateDegrees(Vec2* Result, float Degrees)
00335 {
00336         //float length = Vec2Length(Result);
00337         float radians = 2 * M_PI * Degrees / 360.0f;
00338         float resultX = Result->x * cos(radians) - Result->y * sin(radians);
00339         float resultY = Result->x * sin(radians) + Result->y * cos(radians);
00340 
00341         Vec2Set(Result, resultX, resultY);
00342 }
